publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-107.1 Hugh O’Donnell: Antonine Centre—As an amendment to motion (S3M-107) in the name of Cathie Craigie, insert at end "but regrets that the prevarication and delays caused by North Lanarkshire Council, contrary to its promises given over a period of 10 years, prevented the community of Cumbernauld and Kilsyth from having fitting retail facilities until now." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-107.1 Hugh O’Donnell: Antonine Centre—As an amendment to motion (S3M-107) in the name of Cathie Craigie, insert at end "but regrets that the prevarication and delays caused by North Lanarkshire Council, contrary to its promises given over a period of 10 years, prevented the community of Cumbernauld and Kilsyth from having fitting retail facilities until now."
